name: 李政哲
objective: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.
schedule:
Wk 1~Wk 3  : Chapter 1 : Functions and Limits 
Wk 4~Wk 6  : Chapter 2 : Derivatives
Wk 7~Wk 8  : Chapter 3 : Inverse Functions 
Wk 9 : Midterm
Wk 10~Wk 12 : Chapter 4 : Applications of Differentiation
Wk 13~Wk 14  : Chapter 5 : Integrals
Wk 15~Wk 17: Chapter 6 : Techniques of Integration
Wk 18  : Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance ： 15%
Quizzes： 25%
Diagnostic Test: 10%
Midterm：25%
Final  ： 25%
materials:
1.Textbook : Essential Calculus 2e Metric Version Early Transcendentals, by James Stewart, Daniel Clegg, Saleem Watson, Cengage, Agent: Ting Lung Book Co.
2.References:
 (1)Thomas' Calculus Early Transcendentals (12th edition) 
      George B. Thomas , Maurice D. Weir , Joel Hass
 (2)Calculus 
     S-T Wu、C-H Hong、C-C Lin、C-C Lin、J-J Lin、G-A Liu
